question: You recently stayed in a hotel in another city. When you got home you discovered that you had left something of value in the room.Write a letter to the hotel. In your letter•	describe the item that you left behind and say where you left it•	ask the hotel to arrange to send it to you•	suggest a way to pay for the postage
text: My name is Ikram Lach, I have been at your hotel for a week, from 15th February to 22th. I spent a wonderful experience with all your services and facilities and I was really satisfied.

Unfortunately, when I returned home I had discovered that I have left my earrings and I suppose that I left them in the bathroom. These pieces of jewelry are very crucial for me, My husband has gifted them to me on my last birthday.By the way, I was staying in room number 44.

I have a request, if the agent finds them I will be grateful to send them to me. I think the best way to return back my earrings is by post since it is near to your location. In addition, I will pay you the postage fees in advance with my credit card.
I hope you find them. And I am waiting to hear from you.

error_list.error_des: The spelling of jewelry is a non-British variant. For consistency, consider replacing it with the British English spelling.
